experience.subtitle: Our Story
experience.title: A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE IN THE HEART OF IVRY-SUR-SEINE
experience.description: Magnifiko was born from a dream: to create a place where the authenticity of Italy meets the respect for halal rules, in a modern, family-friendly and warm setting. We are much more than a restaurant: we are a reference for halal Italian cuisine in Île-de-France, a space for sharing for lovers of Italian pasta, artisanal Neapolitan pizzas, traditional desserts and 100% halal and certified products.

pasta.title: OUR PASTA
pasta.description: Our pasta imported from Italy is enhanced by the homemade sauces prepared by our chef.
pasta.note: ✓ Gluten-free available with all our pasta

pizza.title: NEAPOLITAN PIZZAS
pizza.description: Neapolitan pizzas stone-baked, with premium Italian flours and our fior di latte mozzarella.

desserts.title: ITALIAN DESSERTS
desserts.description: Discover our traditional Italian desserts, from strawberries and cream to artisanal panna cotta, prepared with love.

secrets.subtitle: Our Story
secrets.title: SECRETS OF FLAVOR
secrets.paragraph1: We believe that the secret to good pasta also lies in the sauce, which is why all our sauces are prepared on-site using only the finest ingredients. Whether you prefer a classic Amatriciana, a creamy carbonara or a delicious bolognese, we have a sauce that will satisfy your taste buds.
secrets.paragraph2: In our restaurant, we offer a variety of artisanal pasta shapes and sizes, each with its own unique texture and flavor. Whether you prefer simple spaghetti or hearty tonnarelli, our selection of pasta dishes will please you.

step2.privacyNotice: The information you provide as part of your reservation is collected by the restaurant and processed through the booking tool provided by Ochel. It is used only to manage your request (confirmation, modification, cancellation) and to follow up on your visit (email or SMS notifications related to your reservation). This data may also be used by the restaurant to improve your experience and, if you have consented, to send you personalized communications (news, special offers, loyalty campaigns). In accordance with applicable regulations (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your data, as well as the right to object to or limit their processing. You can exercise these rights directly with the restaurant.

certifications.subtitle: Our Certifications
certifications.title: HALAL CERTIFICATIONS
certifications.description1: At Magnifiko, we are committed to upholding the highest halal certification standards. All our ingredients are carefully selected and certified by recognized organizations to guarantee their compliance with Islamic rules.
certifications.description2: Our restaurant is certified by Achahada, one of the most respected halal certification bodies in France. This certification covers our entire supply chain, from supplier selection to dish preparation.
